name: Cross The Red Line
description:
Sometimes it is very necessary to flee the country, for various reasons, and taking into account the committed acts it is not very easy. What to do? Contact a professional! That is you. Form groups of defectors, provide them with the necessary equipment ... and collect a new group, because the game goal is to transfer 100 people. During the game, new border sections and new means for the crossing open up. From a fake passport to an inflatable boat! But you need to choose a place to cross the border wisely, rely on the news, and you will not lose! And if the border guards are too suspicious, try to suggest something, it might help. By the way, for each defector you get money, so you can improve your equipment in order to save as many citizens as possible who are disagreeable with the cursed regime.Features:
  • Several border sections available for passage (Identity Check Point, river, mountains, forest)
  • Many border crossing means
  • A variety of suspicion reduction techniques
  • Sudden events can change the course of the game
